name: Why Work When You Can Film?
name_original: Why Work When You Can Film?
description:
A small game that I made for a university project. With 116 passages it has a run-time of around 15 minutes. I hope you enjoy.

Credits:

Game by Greg Alderton. (https://twitter.com/GregoryAlderton)
